current_plan: Research the company's culture to match their dress code style.
Select a clean, ironed outfit that is slightly more formal than the daily office wear.
Do a 'dress rehearsal' to ensure you're comfortable sitting and walking.
Check for any loose threads, lint, or missing buttons.
Pack a small grooming kit for last-minute touch-ups before you head in.
Add a linting step (like ESLint or Prettier) to your GitHub Action to keep your code clean.
Secure your secrets by adding environment variables to your GitHub Repository Secrets.
Enable Branch Protection on your main branch so code must pass tests before merging.
Try creating a 'Staging' environment to test your app before it hits the live URL.
